snippet.title: Doodle World Deluxe Trailer
snippet.description:
Doodle World Deluxe

Play as Doodle and help him save his world from the evil King Eraser and his office supply minions!

Run, jump and pounce on enemies as you navigate your way through this colorful side-scroller!

Featuring:
-5 Worlds
-15 levels of platforming action
-5 Exciting boss battles
-Innovative "Kids Mode" for younger players

Doodle World features an innovative "Kids Mode". With "Kids Mode" younger players can enjoy the game with more lives,  less levels, and easier enemies and bosses!

Includes all the all new Doodle World Redrawn, a remixed and more difficult version of Doodle World!

Don't forget to follow us!
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DoodleWorldGame

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/DoodleWorldGame
